line.text: %PLAYER%: Professor Xavier, we made it. We found the passageway to the Nuwali temple. Now we can save Beast.
line.textb: %ProfX%: Very good. Now, before you enter the temple, I would recommend you return to Avalon and speak to Ka-Zar. He has requested our help.

line.text: %ProfX%: That's excellent news. But Ka-Zar has just made a disturbing discovery. You may want to return to Avalon and speak to him before you venture into the Nuwali temple.
%PLAYER%: We found the passageway to the Nuwali Temple, Professor. What should we do now?
